title: Why is it that 100% of the time, my jungler won't be the first to gank mid?
body:
If I push mid to shit himself, leaving him with 200 hp and hugging in a matter of minutes. His jungler will ALWAYS rush to help. My jungler won't even fucking know what's going down.  He will shit himself with anger when I call him out after I get ganked for the 17th time. 

Junglers. Just stop. You are fucking terrible. Yes, it's your fault.
